Minutes 2022-08-08

Source: vignettes/minutes/2022-08-01.Rmd
2022-08-01.Rmd

Updates from Hadley

  • Talks at useR and rstudio::conf() appeared to go well
  • Has resulted in some useful issues and PRs (esp. https://github.com/jamieRowen and https://github.com/dgkf).
  • Interest from Merck via email

Next steps

  • HW will continue to work on smaller issues.

  • R-core meeting in Vienna (Sept). ML to present S7 work and hopefully get some buy-in.

  • Base patches? (https://github.com/RConsortium/S7/issues/222)

  • Get to CRAN to get more exposure and figure out how to get into base R itself.
